title: Launcher NOT Working
body:
Hey ppl, any1 know how to fix a launcher that keeps popping a windows that's says 
"PVP.net Patcher Kernal has stopped working and etc.

Pls help because I really want to play and because I haven't played for a while

replies.body: Have you tried running it in admin mode? The pre-patcher occasionally needs to do something that needs admin rights. Not too sure what it is, though.
I am having the same issue played last night no problems, go to play now and get the same message ....help please
